events.message: I just received my order and the product has a large scratch on the surface. It looks damaged and I am very disappointed with the quality.
The reported issue has been categorized under Product Defect due to the customer's description of damage and scratches on the item.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle the defective product complaint and provide assistance.
Hello, thank you for reaching out to us. I'm sorry to hear about the damage to your product and I’m here to help resolve this issue for you.
Could you please provide photos of the scratched area and confirm if the packaging was also damaged upon delivery?
I have attached the photos showing the scratches clearly. The box was slightly crushed, so it seems the damage happened during shipping.
Thank you for the photos. We can offer you a replacement product sent with expedited shipping or a full refund if you prefer.
I appreciate the options. I would like to get a replacement sent as soon as possible please.
We have processed your replacement order and it will be shipped out within 24 hours with expedited delivery at no extra cost.
Checking in to confirm you received the replacement item and that it’s in perfect condition. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Yes, I received the replacement yesterday and it looks great. Thank you very much for the prompt help and quick shipping.
We are happy to hear that you’re satisfied with the replacement. Closing this case now, and feel free to contact us anytime.
A satisfaction survey has been sent to your email to gather feedback about your support experience with us.
